page.title: 10RELIGION
page.content: Farnworth has plenty of churches and religious meeting places, the Moslems of the area do not have a mosque but meet at private houses for their services. The following are the churches in our area with the names of their clergy. Church of England: St. John's -Rev A P Courtley St Peter's Rev B Holt All Saints. Holy Trinity. St Thomas Rev H W Roberts St Michael's Rev B Sagar St Stephen's Rev K F Wainright St Matthew's Rev C F Telford St James' Rev P T Kerr. Roman Catholic: St Gregory's Father Austen. Our Lady of Lourdes Father Sheenan St Teresa Father Corrie. Other Denominations: New Jerusalem Father Grimshaw. Salvation Army Captain Marriot.Trinity Church Rev W Wallbank. Independant Chapel-Hollands School.
